banner.desc: Wherever we're going, relax and earn yield

your-time-card.desc-1: Debt DAO Vaults are a way to use technology to help manage your holdings. You choose the strategy that best suits you, deposit into that vault, and Debt DAO tech helps maximize yield through shifting capital, auto-compounding, and rebalancing.
your-time-card.desc-2: Custody, and responsibility, for your holdings remains yours.
